name: Github Dark Wide Transparent
description:
A wide GitHub theme with transparent panes revealing a background wallpaper image.

If you like this style, please help others find it by giving it the thumbs up in UserStyles.org.

*** This is currently a work-in-progress (re-write) - Hopefully I'll be making daily updates to cover anything I've missed so be patient while I find them all. :-)
additional_info:
2.3.0 (10-Feb-2020) - New headers styles.
2.2.4 (24-Sep-2019) - General timeline updates.
2.2.3 (23-Jul-2019) - Eradicated some white backgrounds.
2.2.2 (18-Jul-2019) - updated xl screen sizes.
2.2.1 (15-May-2019) - Wiki updates.
2.2.0 (02-May-2019) - Updated layouts and styles for issues.
2.1.0 (28-Mar-2019) - New profile and search screen updates.
2.0.13 (21-Mar-2018) - Updated Profile menu and settings
2.0.12 (25-May-2018) - General fixes to breaking changes
2.0.11 (21-Mar-2018) - Updated starred repo list containers and other minor tweaks.
2.0.10 (12-Feb-2018) - Updated labels and code-review elements.
2.0.9 (02-Dec-2017) - Updated marketing and user-stories layouts. Updated Project Cards.
2.0.7 (22-Nov-2017) - Profile/Marketplace/Explore updates.
2.0.4 (31-Oct-2017) - PR tab-menu and Blog updates.
2.0.5 (20-Oct-2017) - General fixes to GitHub changes over time.
2.0.4 (13-Oct-2017) - Update Code Editor.
2.0.3 (11-Oct-2017) - Updates to "Insights" and "branches" pages.
2.0.2 (22-Sep-2017) - Help pages.
2.0.1 (04-Sep-2017) - Minor updates (incomplete overrides).
2.0.0 (29-Aug-2017) - Complete re-write to start with GitHub's most recent layout.

* Aug-2017 - Now works with the "OctoTree" GitHub plugin for Chrome.

discussions.name: Recent updates a turn for the worse
